result.purpose: Responsible for handling Sign-In with Ethereum (SIWE) messages, including their creation, validation, and associated error handling.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to SIWE messages in separate files for error handling, message struct definition, regular expressions, message processing, and utility functions.

internal/services/siwe/error.go.purpose: Defines error types related to SIWE (Sign-In with Ethereum) messages.

internal/services/siwe/message.go.purpose: Defines a Message struct for handling SIWE (Sign-In with Ethereum) messages.

internal/services/siwe/regex.go.purpose: Defines regular expressions for parsing SIWE (Sign-In with Ethereum) messages.

internal/services/siwe/siwe.go.purpose: Handles the creation and validation of messages for Ethereum-based Sign-In with Ethereum (SIWE).

internal/services/siwe/utils.go.purpose: Utility functions for handling timestamps, hashing, and nonce generation in the SIWE context.
